trans-unit.source: Onboard to Operational Insights in minutes | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Onboard to Operational Insights in minutes | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn about how you can get set up with Azure Operational Insights in minutes
trans-unit.target: Learn about how you can get set up with Azure Operational Insights in minutes

trans-unit.source: Onboard to Azure Operational Insights in minutes
trans-unit.target: Onboard to Azure Operational Insights in minutes

trans-unit.source: You can get up and running with Azure Operational Insights in minutes.
trans-unit.target: You can get up and running with Azure Operational Insights in minutes.

trans-unit.source: You have two options when choosing how to create an Operational Insights workspace, which is similar to an account:
trans-unit.target: You have two options when choosing how to create an Operational Insights workspace, which is similar to an account:

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Operations Management Suite
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Operations Management Suite

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: You can create an Operations Management Suite workspace using the Operations Management Suite website.
trans-unit.target: You can create an Operations Management Suite workspace using the Operations Management Suite website.

trans-unit.source: Or, you can use a Microsoft Azure subscription to create an Operational Insights workspace.
trans-unit.target: Or, you can use a Microsoft Azure subscription to create an Operational Insights workspace.

trans-unit.source: Currently, both workspaces are functionally equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Currently, both workspaces are functionally equivalent.

trans-unit.source: The only difference between the two is the name.
trans-unit.target: The only difference between the two is the name.

trans-unit.source: If you use an Azure subscription, you can also use that subscription to access other Azure services.
trans-unit.target: If you use an Azure subscription, you can also use that subscription to access other Azure services.

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the method that you use to create the workspace, you'll create the workspace with either a Microsoft account or organizational account.
trans-unit.target: Regardless of the method that you use to create the workspace, you'll create the workspace with either a Microsoft account or organizational account.

trans-unit.source: Here's a look at the process:
trans-unit.target: Here's a look at the process:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>onboarding process</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>onboarding process</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Sign up in 3 steps using the Operations Management Suite
trans-unit.target: Sign up in 3 steps using the Operations Management Suite

trans-unit.source: Go to the Operations Management Suite website and click Try for free.
trans-unit.target: Go to the Operations Management Suite website and click Try for free.

trans-unit.source: Sign in with your Microsoft account such as Outlook.com, or with an organizational account provided by your company or educational institution to use with Office 365 or other Microsoft services.
trans-unit.target: Sign in with your Microsoft account such as Outlook.com, or with an organizational account provided by your company or educational institution to use with Office 365 or other Microsoft services.

trans-unit.source: Provide a unique workspace name.
trans-unit.target: Provide a unique workspace name.

trans-unit.source: A workspace is a logical container where your management data is stored.
trans-unit.target: A workspace is a logical container where your management data is stored.

trans-unit.source: It provides you a way to partition data between different teams in your organization, as the data is exclusive to its workspace.
trans-unit.target: It provides you a way to partition data between different teams in your organization, as the data is exclusive to its workspace.

trans-unit.source: Specify an email address and the region where you want to have your data stored.
trans-unit.target: Specify an email address and the region where you want to have your data stored.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>create workspace and link subscription</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>create workspace and link subscription</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Next, you can create a new Azure subscription or link to an existing Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: Next, you can create a new Azure subscription or link to an existing Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: If you would like to proceed using the Free Trial, click Not Now.
trans-unit.target: If you would like to proceed using the Free Trial, click Not Now.

trans-unit.source: You're ready to get started with the Operations Management Suite portal.
trans-unit.target: You're ready to get started with the Operations Management Suite portal.

trans-unit.source: You can learn more about setting up your workspace and linking existing Azure accounts to workspaces created with the Operations Management Suite at <link><linkText>Set up your workspace and manage settings</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You can learn more about setting up your workspace and linking existing Azure accounts to workspaces created with the Operations Management Suite at <link><linkText>Set up your workspace and manage settings</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Sign up quickly using Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Sign up quickly using Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Go to the Azure portal and sign in, then in the list of services, select Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: Go to the Azure portal and sign in, then in the list of services, select Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Azure portal</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Azure portal</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Create a workspace, then click Quick Create, and then under Account, type a workspace name, choose a tier, and then choose a location to store the workspace data.
trans-unit.target: Click Create a workspace, then click Quick Create, and then under Account, type a workspace name, choose a tier, and then choose a location to store the workspace data.

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple subscriptions, then you can choose which one to use and then click Create Workspace.
trans-unit.target: If you have multiple subscriptions, then you can choose which one to use and then click Create Workspace.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Azure portal</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Azure portal</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select the workspace you created and then click Visit your Operational Insights account to open the Operations Management Suite website.
trans-unit.target: Select the workspace you created and then click Visit your Operational Insights account to open the Operations Management Suite website.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>visit account</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>visit account</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Operations Management Suite website, enter your email address and click Confirm and continue.
trans-unit.target: In the Operations Management Suite website, enter your email address and click Confirm and continue.

trans-unit.source: A confirmation email will be sent to you.
trans-unit.target: A confirmation email will be sent to you.

trans-unit.source: Open the email and inside it, click Confirm now.
trans-unit.target: Open the email and inside it, click Confirm now.

trans-unit.source: The Operations Management Suite website displays the Overview page.
trans-unit.target: The Operations Management Suite website displays the Overview page.

trans-unit.source: Click Get started to continue.
trans-unit.target: Click Get started to continue.

trans-unit.source: You're ready to get started with the Operations Management Suite portal.
trans-unit.target: You're ready to get started with the Operations Management Suite portal.

trans-unit.source: You can learn more about setting up your workspace and linking existing workspaces that you created with the Operations Management Suite to Azure subscriptions at <link><linkText>Set up your workspace and manage settings</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You can learn more about setting up your workspace and linking existing workspaces that you created with the Operations Management Suite to Azure subscriptions at <link><linkText>Set up your workspace and manage settings</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Getting started with the Operations Management Suite portal
trans-unit.target: Getting started with the Operations Management Suite portal

trans-unit.source: To choose solutions and connect the servers that you want to manage, click the Get Started tile and follow the steps in this section.
trans-unit.target: To choose solutions and connect the servers that you want to manage, click the Get Started tile and follow the steps in this section.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>create workspace and link subscription</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>create workspace and link subscription</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select the solutions you would like to use and then click Add selected Solutions.
trans-unit.target: Select the solutions you would like to use and then click Add selected Solutions.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>solutions</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>solutions</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Choose how you would like to connect to your server environment to gather data:
trans-unit.target: Choose how you would like to connect to your server environment to gather data:

trans-unit.source: Connect any Windows Server or client directly by installing an agent.
trans-unit.target: Connect any Windows Server or client directly by installing an agent.

trans-unit.source: Use System Center Operations Manager to attach your management groups or your entire Operations Manager deployment.
trans-unit.target: Use System Center Operations Manager to attach your management groups or your entire Operations Manager deployment.

trans-unit.source: Use an Azure storage account configured with the Windows or Linux Azure diagnostic VM extension.
trans-unit.target: Use an Azure storage account configured with the Windows or Linux Azure diagnostic VM extension.

trans-unit.source: Configure at least one log to populate your data.
trans-unit.target: Configure at least one log to populate your data.

trans-unit.source: You can select the IIS logs and/or add event logs and then select Save at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: You can select the IIS logs and/or add event logs and then select Save at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: For event logs, you can specify the type of messages including error, warning, and information to monitor.
trans-unit.target: For event logs, you can specify the type of messages including error, warning, and information to monitor.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>solutions</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>solutions</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Optionally, connect servers directly to the Operations Management Suite by installing an agent
trans-unit.target: Optionally, connect servers directly to the Operations Management Suite by installing an agent

trans-unit.source: In the Get Started view, click the Connect a data source node and then click Download Windows Agent.
trans-unit.target: In the Get Started view, click the Connect a data source node and then click Download Windows Agent.

trans-unit.source: You can only install the agent on Windows Server 2008 SP 1 or later or on Windows 7 SP1 or later.
trans-unit.target: You can only install the agent on Windows Server 2008 SP 1 or later or on Windows 7 SP1 or later.

trans-unit.source: Servers need to have an x64 architecture.
trans-unit.target: Servers need to have an x64 architecture.

trans-unit.source: Install the agent on one or more servers.
trans-unit.target: Install the agent on one or more servers.

trans-unit.source: You can install agents one-by-one, or using a more automated method with a <link><linkText>custom script</linkText><title></title></link>, or you can use an existing software distribution solution that you might have.
trans-unit.target: You can install agents one-by-one, or using a more automated method with a <link><linkText>custom script</linkText><title></title></link>, or you can use an existing software distribution solution that you might have.

trans-unit.source: After you agree to the license agreement and you choose your installation folder, select Connect the agent to Microsoft Azure Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: After you agree to the license agreement and you choose your installation folder, select Connect the agent to Microsoft Azure Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>agent setup</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>agent setup</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the next page, you are asked for your Workspace ID and Workspace Key.
trans-unit.target: On the next page, you are asked for your Workspace ID and Workspace Key.

trans-unit.source: Your Workspace ID and key are displayed on the screen where you downloaded the agent file.
trans-unit.target: Your Workspace ID and key are displayed on the screen where you downloaded the agent file.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>attach servers</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>attach servers</linkText>

trans-unit.source: During installation, you can click Advanced to optionally set up your proxy server and provide authentication information.
trans-unit.target: During installation, you can click Advanced to optionally set up your proxy server and provide authentication information.

trans-unit.source: Click the Next button to return to the workspace information screen.
trans-unit.target: Click the Next button to return to the workspace information screen.

trans-unit.source: Click Next to validate your Workspace ID and Key.
trans-unit.target: Click Next to validate your Workspace ID and Key.

trans-unit.source: If any errors are found, you can click Back to make corrections.
trans-unit.target: If any errors are found, you can click Back to make corrections.

trans-unit.source: When your Workspace ID and Key are validated, click Install to complete the agent installation.
trans-unit.target: When your Workspace ID and Key are validated, click Install to complete the agent installation.

trans-unit.source: Log back in to the Operations Management Suite portal, and click the Settings tile on the Overview page.
trans-unit.target: Log back in to the Operations Management Suite portal, and click the Settings tile on the Overview page.

trans-unit.source: A green check mark icon will appear when the agents communicate with the Operations Management Suite service.
trans-unit.target: A green check mark icon will appear when the agents communicate with the Operations Management Suite service.

trans-unit.source: Initially, this takes about 5-10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Initially, this takes about 5-10 minutes.

trans-unit.source: The capacity management and configuration assessment solutions are not currently supported by servers connected directly to the Operations Management Suite.
trans-unit.target: The capacity management and configuration assessment solutions are not currently supported by servers connected directly to the Operations Management Suite.

trans-unit.source: You can also connect the agent to System Center Operations Manager 2012 SP1 and later.
trans-unit.target: You can also connect the agent to System Center Operations Manager 2012 SP1 and later.

trans-unit.source: To do so, select Connect the agent to System Center Operations Manager.
trans-unit.target: To do so, select Connect the agent to System Center Operations Manager.

trans-unit.source: When you choose that option, you send data to the service without requiring additional hardware or load on your management groups.
trans-unit.target: When you choose that option, you send data to the service without requiring additional hardware or load on your management groups.

trans-unit.source: You can read more about connecting agents directly to the Operations Management Suite at <link><linkText>Connect computers directly to Operational Insights</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You can read more about connecting agents directly to the Operations Management Suite at <link><linkText>Connect computers directly to Operational Insights</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, connect servers using System Center Operations Manager
trans-unit.target: Optionally, connect servers using System Center Operations Manager

trans-unit.source: In the Operations Manager console, select Administration.
trans-unit.target: In the Operations Manager console, select Administration.

trans-unit.source: Expand the Operational Insights node and select Operational Insights Connection.
trans-unit.target: Expand the Operational Insights node and select Operational Insights Connection.

trans-unit.source: Click the Register to Operational Insights link towards the top right and follow the instructions.
trans-unit.target: Click the Register to Operational Insights link towards the top right and follow the instructions.

trans-unit.source: After completing the registration wizard, click the Add a Computer/Group link.
trans-unit.target: After completing the registration wizard, click the Add a Computer/Group link.

trans-unit.source: In the Computer Search dialog box you can search for computers or groups monitored by Operations Manager.
trans-unit.target: In the Computer Search dialog box you can search for computers or groups monitored by Operations Manager.

trans-unit.source: Select computers or groups to onboard them to Operational Insights, click Add, and then click OK.
trans-unit.target: Select computers or groups to onboard them to Operational Insights, click Add, and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: You can verify that the Operational Insights service is receiving data by going to the Usage tile in the Operations Management Suite portal.
trans-unit.target: You can verify that the Operational Insights service is receiving data by going to the Usage tile in the Operations Management Suite portal.

trans-unit.source: Data should appear in about 5-10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Data should appear in about 5-10 minutes.

trans-unit.source: You can read more about connecting Operations Manager to the Operations Management Suite at <link><linkText>Connect to Operational Insights from System Center Operations Manager</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You can read more about connecting Operations Manager to the Operations Management Suite at <link><linkText>Connect to Operational Insights from System Center Operations Manager</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, analyze data from cloud services in Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Optionally, analyze data from cloud services in Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: With the Operations Management Suite, you can quickly search event and IIS logs for cloud services and virtual machines by enabling diagnostics for Azure Cloud Services.
trans-unit.target: With the Operations Management Suite, you can quickly search event and IIS logs for cloud services and virtual machines by enabling diagnostics for Azure Cloud Services.

trans-unit.source: You can also receive additional insights for your Azure virtual machines by installing the Microsoft Monitoring Agent.
trans-unit.target: You can also receive additional insights for your Azure virtual machines by installing the Microsoft Monitoring Agent.

trans-unit.source: You can read more about how to configure your Azure environment to use the Operations Management Suite at <link><linkText>Analyze data from servers in Microsoft Azure</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You can read more about how to configure your Azure environment to use the Operations Management Suite at <link><linkText>Analyze data from servers in Microsoft Azure</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Start using <link><linkText>solutions</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Start using <link><linkText>solutions</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Get familiar with <link><linkText>search</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Get familiar with <link><linkText>search</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Use <link><linkText>dashboards</linkText><title></title></link> to save and display your custom searches.
trans-unit.target: Use <link><linkText>dashboards</linkText><title></title></link> to save and display your custom searches.
